trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB210_00841_SEQ_00<tab>Etgar requires your assistance with a raptor predicament.

TEXT_GAIUSB210_00841_SEQ_01<tab>Etgar, a local tender of Wineport's vineyards, has requested your assistance with a grass raptor problem. The scalekin have been munching on the outpost's precious vines, and they must be stopped. Track down four of the beasts and teach them a lesson.
TEXT_GAIUSB210_00841_SEQ_02<tab>You have shown a quartet of raptors what for, and made the vineyards safe for another day. Report your success to Etgar.
TEXT_GAIUSB210_00841_SEQ_03<tab>Etgar seems well pleased by your tidings, and vows to keep you in mind should he have need of your services in the future.

TEXT_GAIUSB210_00841_ETGAR_000_000<tab>Hallo, adventurer! Hear me, or Master Byrglaent will know the reason why! I mean that he'll simply tell you himself if you refuse to hear it from <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_GAIUSB210_00841_ETGAR_000_001<tab>You've no doubt seen those ghastly grass raptors skulking about outside our gates. Well, they've developed a taste for the vines we use to grow our brandewine cherries, and we can't abide that. You <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> kill the horrible creatures!

TEXT_GAIUSB210_00841_ETGAR_000_020<tab>Ah, the conquering <var 08 E905 ((heroine)) ((hero)) /var> returns! And so quickly, too. You are as strong as you are kind, and <var 08 E905 ((pleasingly made about the shoulders)) ((wonderfully trim of waist)) /var>. I shall make sure to keep you in mind should any future troubles creep up.
